events.name: Methodology for lithium supply and demand analysis
events.wd_label: Methodology for lithium supply and demand analysis
events.wd_description: The methodology for analyzing lithium supply and demand includes three main steps: data collection, system dynamics modeling, and scenario building. These steps aim to understand the historical supply of lithium and forecast future demand.
events.description: The methodology for analyzing lithium supply and demand includes three main steps: data collection, system dynamics modeling, and scenario building. These steps aim to understand the historical supply of lithium and forecast future demand.

events.name: Data collection
events.wd_description: Data collection involves gathering historical data on global lithium supply from 1981 to 2015 and estimating lithium demand from 2015 to 2025.
events.description: Data collection involves gathering historical data on global lithium supply from 1981 to 2015 and estimating lithium demand from 2015 to 2025.

events.name: Historical and estimated lithium supply and demand data
events.wd_description: Historical supply data is collected to determine the global lithium supply from 1981 to 2015.
events.description: Historical supply data is collected to determine the global lithium supply from 1981 to 2015.

events.name: System dynamics model for analyzing stocks and flows
events.wd_description: Estimated demand data is gathered to project lithium demand for the years 2015 to 2025.
events.description: Estimated demand data is gathered to project lithium demand for the years 2015 to 2025.

events.name: System dynamics modeling
events.wd_description: System dynamics modeling is used to analyze the dynamic behavior of stocks and flows in the lithium supply chain.
events.description: System dynamics modeling is used to analyze the dynamic behavior of stocks and flows in the lithium supply chain.

events.name: Stocks analysis
events.wd_description: The analysis focuses on the stock levels within the lithium supply chain.
events.description: The analysis focuses on the stock levels within the lithium supply chain.

events.name: Flows analysis
events.wd_description: The analysis examines the flow of lithium through the supply chain.
events.description: The analysis examines the flow of lithium through the supply chain.

events.name: Scenario building
events.wd_description: Scenario building estimates lithium supply from 2015 to 2025, considering different growth rates in production capacity.
events.description: Scenario building estimates lithium supply from 2015 to 2025, considering different growth rates in production capacity.

events.name: Growth rate scenarios
events.wd_description: Different growth rates in production capacity are considered to build scenarios for future lithium supply.
events.description: Different growth rates in production capacity are considered to build scenarios for future lithium supply.

events.name: Scenario building for lithium supply estimation
events.wd_description: The scenarios provide estimates of lithium supply between 2015 and 2025.
events.description: Scenario building is used to estimate lithium supply between 2015 and 2025, considering different growth rates in production capacity.
